backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing two frontend updates: replacing services copy structure and updating ServicesPage rendering.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to short human-written summaries of their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling hash-based navigation and rendering page components with a shared navbar and footer.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Netlify-compatible contact form component managing form state and rendering input fields.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeAccent: Component that renders background accent layers based on the selected variant.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying DREAMONOMY copyright text in a gradient background container.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with scroll styling, mobile menu, and page navigation logic.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Reusable gradient-styled service card showing an icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/content/dreamonomyCopy.ts: Centralized marketing copy definitions for DREAMONOMY, including homepage text, services descriptions, and structured content blocks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication, with reactive query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication provider and hook, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining brand colors, dark mode variables, typography, and reusable UI component classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, and renders the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutWhyPage.tsx: Renders the 'Why DREAMONOMY' page using themed sections, decorative components, and content sourced from structured copy.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with a hero section, introductory text, and a contact form using DREAMONOMY's content definitions.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: React homepage rendering hero, rotating logo, CTA, and services section using dreamonomyCopy and decorative components.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Services page that displays services hero text and structured service sections from dreamonomyCopy with decorative accents.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the current site rewrite state, content replacement rules, architecture notes, and known issues.
